product_name: Threads for Thought Burnout Raglan Crew Neck Shirt - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: This comfy pullover crew sweatshirt is made from supersoft burnout fleece with contrast color raglan sleeves and neckline. Team it up with a pair of jeans for simple, casual style.
short_description: This comfy pullover crew sweatshirt is made from supersoft burnout fleece with contrast color raglan sleeves and neckline. Team it up with a pair of jeans for simple, casual style.
